title: What do musicians use to make the beats in their music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Image Lines FL Studio 10 Pro is a good start.Spend a couple of bucks and get the add-ons you like.They just released 11, haven't seen the changes though. Native Instruments had an outstanding line of software, MASCHINE is good for beats.KOMPLETE, TRAKTOR, and Guitar Rig are incredibly powerful.Bring your wallet. Live, I've always preferred real drummers and bass players for any genre.

Generally, rappers do not make their own beats, producers do.  Beats are typically made either with analog drum machines (the Roland TR-808 is probably the most popular of such) or within sequencing software such as Ableton Live or Apple Logic Studio, combined with a variety of VST plugins to achieve the desired sound.
